<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// accelerator record or not. The TypeEntryBodyPtr can refer to the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Only one of them would be used in final output. So if TypeUnitAccelInfo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// refers OutDIE which does not match with TypeEntryBodyPtr-&gt;getFinalDie()</span></CodeLine>
